name: Lost Cartridge: Cold Read
storyline: Mitch made the journey to the pharmacy one evening, underestimating the true power of the storm outside. After a car accident blocks the shorter route home, he is forced to take shelter in the local library to call for a ride. The library however is now far different than the one he remembers from his childhood. Perhaps it would have been better to freeze outside instead?
summary: Lost Cartridge: Cold Read is the first in a series of horror anthology games by Pure Ice Blue, creator of Lily's Well and I Cannot Drown. Explore the library, hide from those who want Mitch's life to end, and solve puzzles in order to possibly find a way to escape.
